      • logout

        public boolean logout()
        Logs out a user (saves the user file to disk).
        Returns:
        whether the save was successful

      • login

        public static GameController login(java.lang.String username,
                   java.lang.String password)
        Attempts to login a user. Calls DatabaseController and loads the list of existing user accounts. If the username/password is valid, it'll get the user's GameController.
        Parameters:
        username - the username
        password - the password
        Returns:
        null if the login was unsuccessful GameController of the logged in user, if login was successful

      • addUser

        public static boolean addUser(java.lang.String username,
              java.lang.String password,
              boolean isAdmin)
        Adds a new user
        Parameters:
        username - the username
        password - the password
        isAdmin - whether the new user has admin priviliges
        Returns:
        whether the save (to file) was successful

      • removeUser

        public static boolean removeUser(java.lang.String username)
        Removes a user and his/her corresponding files
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user to be deleted
        Returns:
        whether the delete (of the user's file) was successful
